name: Duck in a Truck
description:
You are a duck, and you are in a truck! Save the eggs from the factory, while another player tries to stop you by running into you! Be careful, each time you get hit, you will lose one of the ten eggs! Get to the park!

Controls - Keyboard - Player One uses WASD while player two uses arrow keys

Controls - XBox Controller - Left stick to steer, A to accelerate and B to brake/ reverse

Hurry! The eggs need your help!
